text: 25.20: FG 25.9Gu ana suaŋgi buna nɨɨeŋ kaŋgi za mbuav, gu tuituigia ana nzan za mbuav, na ndɨkndɨk tuituigiap sagi fhuvara. Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap ana nzangeŋ thagi. Gu ana nzangeŋ thav, gu mbaram kha nzambaren ana muuŋgi, ‘Maaŋgi, ndu Zerusareman naangeŋ vuzvugip, ndu Zerusareman naaŋrim, gu vhɨra naaŋv Zerusareman nde buni mbarararga?’
